1.verse: UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu ngokuthanda kukaThixo,  noTimoti umzalwana,

2.verse: ubhalela abaseKolose, abazalwana abangcwele abakholwayo kuKristu; uthi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.

3.verse: Sihlala sibulela kuye uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, xa sinithandazelayo,

4.verse: sivile nje ngokukholwa kwenu kuKristu Yesu, nokubathanda kwenu bonke abangcwele,

5.verse: ngenxa yethemba eli nalibekelwayo emazulwini; nalivayo ngenxa engaphambili ngalo ilizwi lenyaniso leendaba ezi zilungileyo;

6.verse: zikhoyo kuni, njengoko zikhoyo nakulo lonke ihlabathi,  zixakatha neziqhamo, kwanjengoko zixakathayo ngaphakathi kwenu,  kususela kwimini enaluvayo, nalwazi, ubabalo lukaThixo ngenya,  niso.

7.verse: njengoko nafundayo nokufunda kuEpafra, ongumkhonzi oyintanda kunye nathi, engumlungiseleli othembekileyo kaKristu ngenxa yenu;

9.verse: Ngenxa yoku, kususela kwimini esevayo, nathi asiphezi ukunithandazela nokunicelela, ukuze nizaliswe kukukwazi kakuhle ukuthanda kwakhe, ninokulumka nokuqonda konke okukokomoya;

10.verse: ukuze nihambe ngokuyifaneleyo iNkosi, nise kuko konke ukukholisa, nixakathe isiqhamo kuwo wonke umsebenzi olungileyo,  nikhulela ekumazini uThixo;

11.verse: nisomelezwa ngokomelela konke, ngokokuqina kozuko lwakhe,  nide nise kuko konke ukunyamezela, nokuzeka kade umsindo, kunye novuyo;

12.verse: nibulela kuye uYise, owasenza sakulingana ukwahlulelwa ilifa labangcwele ekukhanyeni;

13.verse: owasihlangulayo egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wothando lwakhe,

14.verse: esinayo kuye inkululeko ngokuhlawulelwa ngegazi lakhe,  ukuxolelwa kwezono ke oko.

15.verse: Ungumfanekiselo kaThixo ongenakubonwa, owamazibulo kwindalo yonke.

16.verse: Ngokuba zadalelwa kuye zonke izinto, ezisemazulwini nezisemhlabeni, ezinokubonwa nezingenakubonwa, nokuba ziitrone,  nokuba zibubukhosi, nokuba zizilawuli, nokuba ngamagunya; zonke izinto zidalwe nguye, zidalelwe yena.

17.verse: Yena ke ungaphambi kweento zonke, nazo zonke izinto zima zimi kuye.

18.verse: Yena ke uyintloko yomzimba, yebandla; oyingqalo,  owamazibulo ukuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuze yena abe ngomkhulu ezintweni zonke.

19.verse: Ngokuba kwakholeka ukuthi ukuzaliseka konke kuhlale kuye,

20.verse: nokuthi ngaye azixolelanise naye zonke izinto, elwenzile uxolo ngalo igazi lomnqamlezo wakhe; ewe, ngaye, nokuba zizinto ezisemhlabeni, nokuba zezisemazulwini.

21.verse: Nani, enibe nifudula ningazani noThixo, niziintshaba ngengqondo yenu emisebenzini yenu engendawo, kukalokunje unixolelanisile ngako ukufa emzimbeni wenyama yakhe,

22.verse: ukuze animise ningcwele, ningenakubekwa bala,  ningenakumangalelwa phambi kwakhe;

23.verse: ukuba kaloku nihlala nihleli elukholweni, nisekelwe niqinile, ningashukunyiswa nimke ethembeni leendaba ezilungileyo ezi nazivayo, zona zashunyayelwayo kwindalo yonke ephantsi kwezulu; endaba ngumlungiseleli wazo, mna Pawulos.

24.verse: Ngoku ndiyavuya ezintlungwini zam ngenxa yenu, ndikuzalisa kanye okusileleyo kwiimbandezelo zikaKristu, enyameni yam,  ngenxa yomzimba wakhe olilo ibandla;

25.verse: endaba ngumlungiseleli walo mna ngokokugosisa kukaThixo,  awandigosisa ngako kuni, ukuba ndilizalise ilizwi likaThixo,

26.verse: kwaimfihlelo, leyo ke ibifihliwe kwasemaphakadeni nasezizukulwaneni; kukalokunje ibonakalalisiweyo kubo abangcwele bakhe,

27.verse: awathandayo uThixo ukubazisa bona into obuyiyo ubutyebi bozuko lwaloo mfihlelo phakathi kwazo iintlanga, obunguKristu phakathi kwenu, ithemba lozuko.

28.verse: Sazisa yena ke thina, siluleka wonke umntu, sifundisa wonke umntu ngabo bonke ubulumko, ukuze simise wonke umntu egqibelele ekuKristu Yesu;

29.verse: endibulalekela kona oko, ndizama ngokokusebenza kwakhe okusebenzayo kum ngamandla.

1.verse: Kuba ndithanda ukuba nikwazi ukuba kukhulu kwako ukuzama endikuzamayo ngenxa yenu, nabo baseLawodike, nabo bonke abangabubonanga ubuso bam ngokwenyama;

2.verse: ukuze zithuthuzelwe iintliziyo zabo, bebandakanyiwe ngothando, kusingise kuyo yonke indyebo yokuqonda okuqinisekileyo, kusingise ekwazini imfihlelo kaThixo uYise,  nekaKristu,

3.verse: ekufihlwe kuye bonke ubutyebi bobulumko nobokwazi.

4.verse: Nditsho ke, ukuze kungabikho bani unilukuhlayo ngentetho egudileyo.

5.verse: Kuba nangona ndingekhoyo ngenyama, khona ngomoya ndinani,  ndivuya, ndibona ulungelelwano lwenu, nokuzimaseka kokukholwa kwenu kuKristu.

6.verse: Njengokuba ngoko namamkelayo uKristu Yesu iNkosi, hambani kuye, nendele nakhelwe kuye,

7.verse: naqiniswa ngokholo, njengoko nafundiswayo nafezeka kulo,  ninombulelo.

8.verse: Lumkani, kungabikho bani unithimbayo ngayo intanda-bulumko,  nangokulukuhla okungento yanto, ngokwesithethe sabantu,  ngokweziqalelo zehlabathi, kungengokukaKristu.

9.verse: Ngokuba kuhleli kuye konke ukuzaliseka kobuThixo ngokomzimba;

10.verse: kanjalo nigqibelele kuye, oyintloko yabo bonke ubulawuli negunya;

11.verse: enathi kuye naluswa nokwaluswa ngolwaluko olungenakwenziwa ngazandla, ngako ukuhluba umzimba wenyama, ngalo ulwaluko lukaKristu;

12.verse: ningcwatywe naye elubhaptizweni; enathi nikuye, navuswa nokuvuswa naye, ngokukholwa kwenu kukusebenza kukaThixo,  owamvusa kubo abafileyo.

13.verse: Nani, nifile nje ziziphoso nakukungaluki kwenyama yenu,  unidlise ubomi ndawonye naye, enixolele zonke iziphoso.

14.verse: Ewucimile umbhalo wesandla owalana nathi, owawumelene nathi ngayo imimiselo, uwususile ke kanye, ngokuwubethelela emnqamlezweni;

15.verse: ebabhunyule obalawuli nomagunya, wabenza isibonelo ekuhleni, ememelela ngabo ekuwo umnqamlezo.

16.verse: Makungabikho mntu ngoko unigwebayo ngento edliwayo,  nangento eselwayo, nangendawo yomthendeleko, nangenyanga ethwasileyo, nangeesabatha;

17.verse: ezisisithunzi sezinto eziza kuza; ke sona isiqu sesikaKristu.

18.verse: Makungabikho namnye unilahlekanisa nomvuzo wenu, ethanda ukwenjenjalo ngokuthobeka kwentliziyo, nangokunqula izithunywa zezulu, engena ezintweni angazibonanga, efumana wakhukhumaliswa yiyo ingqiqo yenyama yakhe,

19.verse: engabambe yona iNtloko, ekuphuma kuyo ukuthi umzimba wonke ukhule ngokukhulisa kukaThixo, uncedwa, ubandakanywa ngako konke ukuxhomekelelana kwamalungu nemisipha.

20.verse: Ukuba ngoko nafa noKristu, nakhululeka kuzo iziqalelo zehlabathi, yini na ukuba ninge nisadla ubomi ngokwabehlabathi,  nimiselwe imimiselo

21.verse: (eyokuthi, Musa ukuphatha, musa ukungcamla, musa ukuchukumisa,

22.verse: kanti zonke ezi zinto zezonakaliswa kukudliwa), nenze ngokwemithetho neemfundiso zabantu?

23.verse: Okunene zizinto ezo ezidunyelwe bubulumko ngokunqula okuzithandelayo, nangokuthobeka kwentliziyo, nangokubandezela umzimba, kodwa kungengambeko yanelisa inyama.

1.verse: Ukuba ngoko navuswa kunye noKristu, funani izinto zaphezulu,  apho akhona uKristu, ehleli ngasekunene kukaThixo.

3.verse: Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo.

4.verse: Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, ngelo xesha niya kubonakalaliswa nani, ninaye ebuqaqawulini.

5.verse: Bhubhisani ngoko amalungu enu asemhlabeni: umbulo,  ukungcola, ukuthabatheka okuhlazisayo, inkanuko embi, nokubawa,  okuyinkonzo yezithixo kona oko;

6.verse: eza ngenxa yezo zinto ingqumbo kaThixo phezu kwabangevayo;

7.verse: enanifudula nihamba phakathi kwazo nani, okuya nibe nisidla ubomi nikuzo.

8.verse: Ke ngoku, nani aba, kulahleni oku konke: ingqumbo, umsindo,  ulunya, ukunyelisa; ukuthetha amanyala kungabikho emlonyeni wenu.

9.verse: Musani ukuxokisana, nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, kunye nezenzo zakhe,

10.verse: nambatha lowo umtsha, uhlaziyelwa ekwazini okuhle,  ngokomfanekiselo walowo wamdalayo;

11.verse: apho kungekho mGrike namYuda, kwaluka nokungaluki,  mbharbhari namSkitiya, khoboka namkhululeki; usuke uKristu waba zizinto zonke, waba kubo bonke.

12.verse: Yambathani ngoko, njengabanyulwa bakaThixo, abangcwele,  abathandiweyo, iimfesane zeemfefe, ububele, ukuthobeka kwentliziyo, ubulali, ukuzeka kade umsindo,

13.verse: ninyamezelana, nixolelana, ukuba ubani uthi abe nokusola ngakubani; njengokuba naye uKristu wanixolelayo, yenjani njalo nani.

14.verse: Ke, phezu kwazo zonke ezo zinto, yalekani uthando,  oluyintambo yogqibelelo.

15.verse: Uxolo lukaThixo, enabizelwa kwakulo mzimbeni mnye,  malulawule ezintliziyweni zenu, nibe nokubulela.

16.verse: Ilizwi likaKristu malihlale ngaphakathi kwenu ngokobutyebi;  nifundisana, nilulekana ngabo bonke ubulumko; nithi,  ngeendumiso neengoma nezango ezizezomoya, nivume kamnandi entliziyweni yenu kuyo iNkosi.

17.verse: Nako konke enisukuba nikwenza ngelizwi, nokuba kungomsebenzi, yenzani izinto zonke egameni leNkosi uYesu,  nibulela ngayo kuye uThixo uYise.

18.verse: Nina bafazi, walulameleni awenu amadoda, njengoko kufanele abaseNkosini.

19.verse: Nina madoda, bathandeni abafazi benu, ningabi bukhali kubo.

20.verse: Nina bantwana, balulameleni abazali benu ezintweni zonke;  kuba oko kukholekile kuyo iNkosi.

21.verse: Nina boyise, musani ukubacaphukisa abantwana benu, ukuze bangafi iintliziyo.

22.verse: Nina bakhonzi, balulameleni ezintweni zonke abaziinkosi zenu ngokwenyama; kungabi ngankonzo yamehlo, ngathi ningabakholisi-bantu; makube ngokwentliziyo engenakumbi,  nisoyika uThixo.

23.verse: Nako konke enisukuba nikwenza, kusebenzeni ngokwasemphefumlweni, kunge kukwiNkosi, akukhona kubantu;

24.verse: nisazi nje ukuba niya kuyamkela eNkosini imbuyekezo yelifa;  kuba nikhonza iNkosi uKristu.

25.verse: Lowo umonayo omnye uya kukuthwala oko kona one ngako;  kanjalo akukho kukhetha buso bamntu.

1.verse: Nina baziinkosi, baphatheni ngokufanelekileyo nangokulungeleleneyo abanikhonzayo; nisazi nje ukuba nani ngokwenu nineNkosi emazulwini.

3.verse: kunye noko nisithandazela, ukuze uThixo asivulele umnyango welizwi, ukuba siyithethe imfihlelo kaKristu, endikhonkxwe ngenxa yayo;

4.verse: ukuze ndiyibonakalalise, njengoko ndimelwe kukuthetha ngako.

5.verse: Hambani ngobulumko ngakwabo bangaphandle, nilonga ixesha eli.

6.verse: Ukuthetha kwenu makuhlale kumnandi, kuvakalisiwe ngetyuwa,  ukuze nazi ukuba nimelwe kukuthini na ukuphendula bonke ngabanye.

7.verse: Izinto zonke ezilunge nam wonazisa uTikiko, umzalwana oyintanda, umlungiseleli othembekileyo, ongumkhonzi kunye nam eNkosini;

8.verse: endimthumele khona oku kuni, ukuze azazi iindawo ezingani,  azithuthuzele iintliziyo zenu;

9.verse: kunye no-Onesimo, umzalwana othembekileyo, oyintanda,  ongomnye wenu. Bonazisa izinto zonke zalapha.

10.verse: Uyanibulisa uAristarko, ongumbanjwa ndawonye nam, noMarko umtshana kaBharnabhas, enamkela imithetho ngaye; ukuba uthe weza kuni, mamkeleni;

11.verse: noYesu, ekuthiwa nguYusto, kwabolwaluko; ngabo bodwa abasebenzisana nam ngenxa yobukumkani bukaThixo, abathe bona baba sisonwabiso kum.

12.verse: Uyanibulisa uEpafra ongomnye wenu, umkhonzi kaKristu,  ehlala ezama ngenxa yenu emithandazweni, ukuze nime nigqibelele, nizalisekile kuko konke ukuthanda kukaThixo.

13.verse: Kuba ndiyamngqinela ukuba unenzondelelo enkulu ngenxa yenu,  nabo baseLawodike, nabo baseHirapoli.

15.verse: Bulisani kubazalwana abaseLawodike, nakuNimfa, nakulo ibandla elisendlwini yakhe.

16.verse: Xa ke le ncwadi ithe yaleswa kuni, ize nenze ukuba ileswe nasebandleni eliseLawodike; nani niyilese leyo iphuma eLawodike.

17.verse: Yithini kuArkipo, Lukhangele ulungiselelo owalwamkelayo lwaseNkosini, ukuze uluzalise.

18.verse: Umbuliso lo ungesam isandla, mna Pawulos. Yikhumbuleni imixokelelwane yam. Ubabalo malube nani. Amen.
